review: Doctor was having very good knowledge about the problem and gave good treatment for my spouse and crown fixing done at very reasonable cost with good quality.

review: All I could say is whenever I come here,l never felt like a patient.Special thanks to the entire team who makes me feel at home.As far as treatment is concerned Dr Deepak sir is very professional. Takes time to explain things and resolve problems.A pleasant experience always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a wonderful experience here as always. Few years back I got my dental treatment done during 5th month of my pregnancy and I was very comfortable .There were no complications. Now I have got my son's treatment also done .The Doctor's work is very nice. Very trusting.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The LADY doctor is very patient enough to treat me. She is very kind enough to explain things and very supportive during treatment. The explanation given by her is very soft and understandable. 
If she was a general physician, i would have gone to her for all generic problems also.
